title: Input schema for the hello_word actor.

addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.description: All addresses to scrape the "Zestimate" from

cookiesToScrape.title: Cookies to Scrape (Default: 5)
cookiesToScrape.description: The number of cookies to scrape, then use to scrape Zestimates. Increase this number if you have a lot of addresses. (Affects performance)

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Select proxies to be used by your crawler.
